fields.description: I'm not sure if it's just this combination of circumstances, but I'm launching in debug mode from Ti Studio to an emulator session that is not working correctly in Fastdev.  The result is a crash because of an unprepared looper.  [See logcat|http://pastie.org/private/ae2lna7nohaevpovqsfpfq].
fields.summary: Android: App crash with combination of functioning debug session but failed fastdev session
